#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t!=0)
    {
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        int l=s.length();int p=0;
        for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
            {if(s.at(i)=='a' || s.at(i)=='e' || s.at(i)=='i' ||s.at(i)=='o' || s.at(i)=='u' ||s.at(i)=='A' ||s.at(i)=='E' ||s.at(i)=='I' ||s.at(i)=='O' || s.at(i)=='U' )
               {
                   p=1;
                   break;
               }

        }
        if(p==1)
            cout<<"yes"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"no"<<endl;
        t--;
    }
    return 0;
}
